properties.address: Cheam Library, Church Road, Cheam, Sutton SM3 8QH
properties.description: Cheam Library is accessible on the ground floor where all services and public toilets are located. There is a public pay & display car park adjacent plus spaces for Blue Badge holders. Please note Warm Space Volunteers are located at nearby Sutton Library.
properties.title: Cheam Library

properties.address: Christ Church Ewell, Cheam Road, Ewell, Surrey KT17 1AD
properties.description: Lonely people welcome and anyone else! Wednesdays 10am - 12Noon. Coffee Drop In with hot filter coffee, tea, quality biscuits, opportunity to meet others in the community, scrabble, rummikub
properties.title: Christ Church Ewell

properties.address: Circle Library, Green Wrythe Lane, Carshalton, Sutton SM5 1JJ
properties.description: Circle Library is fully accessible and has automatic doors. Free car parking is available at the rear of the building. Warm Space Volunteers will be on site Thursday & Friday, 10am-1pm & 1-4pm to signpost for information and advice.
properties.title: Circle Library
